=Form Layout=

==flz_combifield==

===Why is the image not aligned with the input field?===

Maybe you have missed the *flz_box* in the surrounding *div*. In this case the image after the input field is not correctly aligned with the bottom of the input field. 

Wrong code: The *flz_box* is missing.

{{{
   <div class="flz_relative">
      <label for="textbox2">Textbox</label>
      <div class="flz_combifield">
         <input id="textbox2" type="text" class="flz_textbox" />
      </div>
      <a href="#"><img class="flz_combifield" src="images/datepicker.gif" alt=""/></a>
  </div>
}}}

Correct code: *flz_box* is added to the surrounding *div*

{{{
   <div class="flz_box flz_relative">
      <label for="textbox2">Textbox</label>
      <div class="flz_combifield">
         <input id="textbox2" type="text" class="flz_textbox" />
      </div>
      <a href="#"><img class="flz_combifield" src="images/datepicker.gif" alt=""/></a>
  </div>
}}}

===Why is the textbox not correctly aligned with others in the same row?===

Maybe the *label* tag is not on the correct position within the markup. In that case the *label* is aligned correctly with others in the same row, while the textbox slips a little bit below the other textboxes.

Wrong code: the *label* tag is outside of the *div* marked with *flz_combifield*

{{{
   <div class="flz_box flz_relative">
      <label for="textbox2">Textbox</label>
      <div class="flz_combifield">
         <input id="textbox2" type="text" class="flz_textbox" />
      </div>
      <a href="#"><img class="flz_combifield" src="images/datepicker.gif" alt=""/></a>
  </div>
}}}

Correct code: the *label* is placed within the *div* marked with *flz_combifield*

{{{
   <div class="flz_box flz_relative">
      <div class="flz_combifield">
         <label for="textbox2">Textbox</label>
         <input id="textbox2" type="text" class="flz_textbox" />
      </div>
      <a href="#"><img class="flz_combifield" src="images/datepicker.gif" alt=""/></a>
  </div>
}}}
